createharmonics.audio.binary.instruction:
Download Instructions for %1$s

Please download %1$s binary from this link: %2$s
The link is specific to your operating system and architecture, but double-check to ensure compatibility

Extract the contents of the archive in this folder: %3$s
(If the file is just a single executable place it directly in the folder)
createharmonics.gui.library_installer.to: There was an error installing the library. Please try again.
The library has been installed successfully.
createharmonics.gui.library_setup.delete: Delete the library files from your computer
createharmonics.gui.library_setup.ffmpeg: Library used for converting audio files to playable formats.
createharmonics.gui.library_setup.librar: This mod requires external libraries to function. Would you like to install them automatically?
External libraries cannot be downloaded automatically on CurseForge. Please follow the instructions to install them manually.
createharmonics.gui.library_setup.manual:
With manual installation you need to download and place the required libraries yourself.

 Installing the binaries requires manually downloading the files and extracting them to the correct folders.

In the §oproviders§r folder there are two more folders. In each you will find direct instructions.
createharmonics.gui.library_setup.title: Library Setup
createharmonics.gui.library_setup.ytdlp_: Library used for getting stream and audio information from various websites.
createharmonics.gui.record_press_base.ur:
Select Previous URL
The pointer shows the currently selected URL

Select Next URL
The pointer shows the currently selected URL

Enter a URL to download audio from
Full URL shown below (may be scrollable if long)

Random Mode
URLs are selected randomly based on weights

Sequential Mode
URLs are played in order from top to bottom
createharmonics.gui.record_press_base.we:
Set the playback weight for this URL (0.00-1.00)
Higher weight = more likely to play
Using Andesite Jukeboxes
Andesite jukeboxes can play audio from Ethereal Records
In pause mode, redstone controls the playback, so power to play, unpower to pause
When the redstone signal is analog, volume and play mode can be controlled
In play mode, it will only loop when fully powered, scaling volume with power level
In pause mode, audio will always loop, with volume scaled by power level, pausing only when fully unpowered
Mechanical arms works on Andesite jukeboxes and it has special behaviours based on the mode
In play mode, when unpowered or not fully powered, arms will extract the record only if the playback ends
In play mode if powered fully, arms can't extract the record
In pause mode, arms will extract the record when fully unpowered
Ethereal jukeboxes work on contraptions too
The Andesite Jukebox pauses audio when the contraption stops, by default
Right-Click to manually insert or pop Ethereal Records from it
Playback is resumed when the contraption starts moving again
Jukeboxes affects audio pitch relative to its position speed
Modes set before assembly works on contraptions, allowing some special cases and locking the pitch
Redstone level is also preserved, allowing for volume regulation both on play and pause modes
If the jukebox is on pause mode, and powered, it will play audio even if the contraption is stopped
If in play mode, redstone will only control the volume, but playback will stop when the contraption stops
Each Ethereal Record has some intrinsic audio effects
Based on the rotational speed supplied, the pitch of the audio will change
Andesite jukeboxes have 2 modes, play and pause
When in play mode, the audio will play once and stop when finished
In pause mode the playback will be simply manually paused, and can be resumed resetting to play mode
When powered they behave differently depending on the mode
In play mode, they will loop the playback until unpowered
createharmonics.ponder.record_press_base: Record Press Bases are depot-like blocks used for setting urls on Ethereal Records
Ethereal Records can be dropped on top of the press base
Or be sledded in using conveyor belts
Right-Click to open the configuration interface
You can create a list of urls to be set, and choose the mode of selection
When a record is present, a mechanical press must be used to inprint the url onto it
